mapper.select: select g.ATOP_Title 顶级渠道 ,date(a.CreateDate) 日期,dayname(a.CreateDate) 星期 ,sum(a.ODER_Money) 销售额 from t_shop_order_info a left join t_device_device_info h on a.ODER_DUid = h.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on h.DDI_No = d.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info i on a.ODER_SPUid = i.SHOP_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON i.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where a.ODER_State = 0 and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and d.DSI_Anti is null and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') = #{filterMap.queryMonth} and g.ATOP_Title = #{filterMap.channelValue} group by 顶级渠道,日期

select g.ATOP_Title 渠道名称,count(b.DDI_No) as 设备数 from (select DDI_No,SHOP_No,DSI_Anti from study.t_device_sub_info where date(DSI_Try) <= #{startDate} and (date(DSI_Withdraw) >= #{endDate} or DSI_Withdraw is null)) b left join t_device_device_info a on a.DDI_No = b.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info e on b.SHOP_No = e.SHOP_No LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON e.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid left join study.t_shop_sub_info d on e.SHOP_No = d.SHOP_No where DSI_Anti is null group by 渠道名称

select g.ATOP_Title 顶级渠道 ,date(a.CreateDate) 日期,dayname(a.CreateDate), ROUND(0.01*g.ATOP_ShopBonus*(sum(a.ODER_Money)-ifnull(sum(c.FLRF_RefundMoney),0)),2) 门店分成金额 from t_shop_order_info a left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_flow b on a.ODER_Note = b.FLOW_OrderId left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_refund c on b.FLOW_Uid = c.FLRF_FLUid left join t_device_device_info h on a.ODER_DUid = h.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on h.DDI_No = d.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info i on a.ODER_SPUid = i.SHOP_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON i.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where a.ODER_State = 0 and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and d.DSI_Anti is null and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') = #{queryMonth} group by 顶级渠道,日期
limit #{pageWrapper.start},#{pageWrapper.pageSize};

select count(*) from ( select g.ATOP_Title 顶级渠道 ,date(a.CreateDate) 日期,dayname(a.CreateDate), ROUND(0.01*g.ATOP_ShopBonus*(sum(a.ODER_Money)-ifnull(sum(c.FLRF_RefundMoney),0)),2) 门店分成金额 from t_shop_order_info a left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_flow b on a.ODER_Note = b.FLOW_OrderId left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_refund c on b.FLOW_Uid = c.FLRF_FLUid left join t_device_device_info h on a.ODER_DUid = h.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on h.DDI_No = d.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info i on a.ODER_SPUid = i.SHOP_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON i.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where a.ODER_State = 0 and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and d.DSI_Anti is null and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') = #{queryMonth} group by 顶级渠道,日期 ) temp

select g.ATOP_Title 顶级渠道 ,date(a.CreateDate) 日期,dayname(a.CreateDate),0.01*(g.ATOP_AllBonus-g.ATOP_ShopBonus)*(sum(a.ODER_Money)-ifnull(sum(c.FLRF_RefundMoney),0)) 渠道分成金额 from t_shop_order_info a left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_flow b on a.ODER_Note = b.FLOW_OrderId left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_refund c on b.FLOW_Uid = c.FLRF_FLUid left join t_device_device_info h on a.ODER_DUid = h.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on h.DDI_No = d.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info i on a.ODER_SPUid = i.SHOP_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON i.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where a.ODER_State = 0 and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and d.DSI_Anti is null and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') = #{queryMonth} group by 顶级渠道,日期
limit #{pageWrapper.start},#{pageWrapper.pageSize};

select count(*) from ( select g.ATOP_Title 顶级渠道 ,date(a.CreateDate) 日期,dayname(a.CreateDate),0.01*(g.ATOP_AllBonus-g.ATOP_ShopBonus)*(sum(a.ODER_Money)-ifnull(sum(c.FLRF_RefundMoney),0)) 渠道分成金额 from t_shop_order_info a left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_flow b on a.ODER_Note = b.FLOW_OrderId left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_refund c on b.FLOW_Uid = c.FLRF_FLUid left join t_device_device_info h on a.ODER_DUid = h.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on h.DDI_No = d.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info i on a.ODER_SPUid = i.SHOP_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON i.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where a.ODER_State = 0 and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and d.DSI_Anti is null and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') = #{queryMonth} group by 顶级渠道,日期 ) temp

select g.ATOP_Title 顶级渠道,g.ATOP_ShopBonus 门店分成比例,g.ATOP_AllBonus 全部分成比例,(g.ATOP_AllBonus-g.ATOP_ShopBonus) 渠道分成比例 from netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g group by 顶级渠道
limit #{pageWrapper.start}, #{pageWrapper.pageSize};

select date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') 月份,ifnull(sum(c.FLRF_RefundMoney),0) 退款 from t_shop_order_info a left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_flow b on a.ODER_Note = b.FLOW_OrderId left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_refund c on b.FLOW_Uid = c.FLRF_FLUid left join t_device_device_info h on a.ODER_DUid = h.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on h.DDI_No = d.DDI_No where a.ODER_State = 0 and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and d.DSI_Anti is null and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') >= #{filterMap.startMonth} and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') <= #{filterMap.endMonth} group by 月份;

select g.ATOP_Title 顶级渠道,date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') 月份,ifnull(sum(c.FLRF_RefundMoney),0) 退款 from t_shop_order_info a left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_flow b on a.ODER_Note = b.FLOW_OrderId left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_refund c on b.FLOW_Uid = c.FLRF_FLUid left join t_device_device_info h on a.ODER_DUid = h.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on h.DDI_No = d.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info i on a.ODER_SPUid = i.SHOP_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON i.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where a.ODER_State = 0 and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and d.DSI_Anti is null and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') >= #{filterMap.startMonth} and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') <= #{filterMap.endMonth} group by 顶级渠道,月份

select g.ATOP_Title 顶级渠道 ,date(a.CreateDate) 日期,dayname(a.CreateDate),ifnull(sum(c.FLRF_RefundMoney),0) 退款 from t_shop_order_info a left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_flow b on a.ODER_Note = b.FLOW_OrderId left join netfiance_db.t_finance_bank_refund c on b.FLOW_Uid = c.FLRF_FLUid left join t_device_device_info h on a.ODER_DUid = h.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on h.DDI_No = d.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info i on a.ODER_SPUid = i.SHOP_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON i.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where a.ODER_State = 0 and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and d.DSI_Anti is null and date_format(a.CreateDate,'%Y-%m') = #{filterMap.queryMonth} and g.ATOP_Title = #{filterMap.channelValue} group by 顶级渠道,日期
